comments.body: You could add a debug task here in order to print the PostgreSQL version tested. The version appears only when verbose is enabled.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +273,277 @@# on the version. See https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/24625
# for more details.
- name: Get Postgres version 
  become_user: "{{ pg_user }}"
  become: True
